title: TaskOn
author: TaskOn
content: As the TaskOn community scales, we are now calling for warm-hearted, active #HelpingHand from all over the world to better develop local language channels.As a Helping Hand, you can interact with local community members, maintain local language channels by answering general questions, guiding users, translating regular campaign content and inviting everyone to participate. If youâ€™re chosen, you will get the limited role, and share the FIRST and ONLY 200 OG NFT airdrop as well.Take a few moments to apply now:ðŸŒŸRT #HelpingHand role tweet (https://twitter.com/taskonxyz/status/1569990672035516419?s=20&t=Ixp28AcDQ2ybAzDYS_TJcg)ðŸŒŸJoin our Discord Channel (https://discord.com/invite/tjszFr7wHz)ðŸŒŸFill in the Google form (https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeS_QVRGkG-_RpCszOfU43R-BoYZi-I4nlbH9fJ1eKn3AzbyA/viewform)Note:This is an early bird project. We will give selected Helping Hands a limited number of OG NFT airdrops exclusively, no more than 200.We will announce conditions related to TaskOn Initial Tokens airdrop after the early bird Roles Program ends, depending on the contribution of each role and the rarity of the OG NFT.After the early bird event, we will give priority to recruiting formal Moderators from Helping Hands to take on more responsibilities and share more rewards.Remember to follow TaskOnâ€™s Twitter, more information about other roles and special rewards coming soon!About TaskOnTaskOn is a platform that boosts the completion of various Web3 tasks in a decentralized way. It helps task initiators and implementers to collaborate efficiently and better align mutual interests. Everyone is encouraged to create, collaborate and rewarded.Website: Taskon.xyzTwitter: https://twitter.com/taskonxyzDiscord: https://discord.gg/a5FpymHSMY
